ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature
⅔ cup sucralose sugar substitute (such as Splenda® Granulated)

cookingTips: Room temperature cream cheese and eggs blend smoothly without lumps
Use Instant Pot's steam feature for perfect cheesecake texture every time
Top with fresh fruit just before serving for best presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Instant Pot cheesecake is foolproof and faster than traditional methods. What other toppings would work?
